messages.content:
Subject: Invitation to Discuss the Future of Financial Regulation on FinTech Futures

Dear Dr. García,

I hope you are well. My name is Maya Patel, host of the "FinTech Futures" podcast, where we explore the intersecting worlds of technology and finance with leading voices.

Our upcoming episode, titled **"The Future of Financial Regulation in a Digital World,"** will dive into how central banks and regulators are shaping policy around digital payments, stablecoins, and emerging fintech innovations. Given your pioneering work as Head of FinTech Innovation at the European Central Bank, and your recent research on stablecoin frameworks, we believe your insights would be invaluable to our listeners.

We would be honored if you could join me for a 45‑minute conversation (recorded remotely at your convenience) sometime in the next two weeks. The episode will be promoted to an audience of over 30,000 fintech enthusiasts, policymakers, and industry professionals who are eager to hear about the ECB’s vision for the digital financial ecosystem.

Please let me know if you are interested and what dates/times work best for you. I am happy to accommodate your schedule and provide any additional information you may need.

Thank you for considering our invitation. I look forward to the possibility of featuring your expertise on FinTech Futures.

Warm regards,
Maya Patel
Host, FinTech Futures Podcast
m.patel@fintechfutures.com
